name: Title
desc: A widget that describes this app in the operating system.

fields.name: title
fields.desc: A one-line description of this app for use in the window manager.

fields.name: color
fields.desc: A color that the window manager should use to identify this app. Must be an opaque color (i.e. color.alpha must be 255 (0xFF)), and must not be null.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.
